title: MarketWatch - The Big Market Risks to Your Portfolio
description: Are you diversified? Inflation, war and a pandemic rage, but the level of risk in your portfolio may not be readily apparent. MarketWatch managing editor for enterprise Nathan Vardi speaks with Sander Gerber, CEO of Hudson Bay Capital about how he manages risk at his $15 billion hedge fund, and his recent work with Nobel prize winner Harry Markowitz on measuring portfolio optimization.
